"Zone","To-Do","Notes","Layout Rules","Layout Video"
"Twilight Strand","Kill Hillock","Hillock is guranteed Level up, no need to kill anything else here","Stay on the Waterside of the zone, 
after Support Gem Crate Choke Point continue straight top right corner of Screen",""
"1. Town Visit","Initial Active Skill","Tarkleigh: Level 1 Skill Gem Reward","",""
"Coast","Rush to WP","No need to kill Enemies here, next two zones will suffice to reach level 4","Go Right till Wall, keep in mind Ledge ""stairs"", try to stay on waterside and keep moving right
Sometimes the zone goes top to bottom instead of left to right.
if you have a small gun or upside down checkmark, if the wall is very thin after it go past it, otherwise go downwards",""
"Mud Flats","Unlock Submerged","","Tiny Rivers connecting the Nest in a triangle form, 
go up after the third nest. If you at the waterside go left till you find the entry, otherwise go right. ","https://youtube.com/shorts/VNFBKyYB13Y"
"Submerged Passage","Get to WP","","",""
"Coast","Enter Tidal Island","","",""
"Tidal Island","Kill Hillraik / Get Medicine Chest","You want to be Level 4 to use MS Skill and Quicksilver Flask after killing Hillraik","Take the left side,usualy quicker, if you get a ledge, turn around and take the right side.
Going along the ledge will take longer.",""
"2. Town Visit","LvL 4 Support & Active Gems","Nessa: Quicksilver, Level 4 Support Gem, Tarkleigh: Level 4 Skill Gem Reward","",""
"Submerged Passage","Place Portal at Bridge","","The Ledge Entry is always after a Bridge, the Depths Entry is left or right turn from Bridge","https://youtube.com/shorts/vIr0gxLJZP8?si=HZsj5KC-DuqoWbc9"
"Submerged Passage","Get to Ledge","","",""
"Ledge","Get to Climb","","Linear Line, you can take the first Tunnel and then stick to the Mountain facing Wall to kill the Goats for big Exp",""
"Climb","Get to Lower Prison","","Linearish Zone
There are 5 Ledges the last one containing a unique RoA Skeleton",""
"Lower Prison","WP to Town","","",""
"3. Town Visit","Take Portal","Early Nessa Level 8 Support Gem, quicker to wait till next Town Visit","",""
"Submerged Passage","Get to Flooded Depths","","",""
"Flooded Depths","Kill Deep Dweller","","The Dweller is in one of the four cardinal Directions from the Entrance, look which direction is open 
and which ones are closed",""
"4. Town Visit","Passive Point, LvL 8 Supports","Nessa: Level 8 Support Gem, Bestel: Passive Point","",""
"Lower Prison","Trial","","Top Right is either a Dead End or containing the trial.
The Entrance to Upper Prison can be either left or right side from WP
If the zone is right side open, traverse the zone clockwise.
If the trial is left side, the entrance to upper prison is top left.
If the trial is right side but dead end otherwise, the entrance is down, in the bottom corner.",""
"Lower Prison","Get to Upper Prison","","",""
"Upper Prison","Kill Brutus","[Optional] Flask Strongbox","the exit is either in a corner or opposite the entrance and the zone is O shaped with a empty center.
always check the top right side first, the flask strongbox is in any of the 4 corners",""
"5. Town Visit","Level 10 Mobility Skill","Tarkleigh: Level 10 Movement Gem","",""
"Prisoner's Gate","Get to Ship Graveyard","","Stay on the side of the wp from the road, if you dont find the ledge after following the road for a bit
cross the road and go down the ledge, find the passage and follow it, when the area opens up
turn left and follow the right wall till you find a second passage, follow the layout to Ship Graveyard.
If you did not have to cross the road, follow the left wall instead after the area opens up again.",""
"Ship Graveyard","Place Portal at Cave Entrance","","If the Zone layout goes down , go down/bottom right till seeing the cave entrance
then from there bottom left till right wall curves down, follow the wall to find Merveil's Cavern
Otherwise follow the left wall up, till you see the Cave entrance or Merveil's Cavern.
If you see Merveil's cavern first, go down from there to find Cave Entrance",""
"Cavern of Wrath","Get WP","","",""
"6. Town Visit","Level 12 Skill","Nessa: Level 12 Skill Gem Reward","",""
"Ship Graveyard Cave","Get Allflame","","the exit is in a diagonal line from the entrance, with a lot of dead ends branching of, try to keep the diagonal line in mind when traversing",""
"Ship Graveyard","Kill Fairgraves","Exiting the SGC leaves you at Fairgraves","",""
"7. Town Visit","Passive Point","Bestel: Passive Point
Get rest of your Act 1 Gems now or when revisiting during Act 2","",""
"Cavern of Wrath","Get to Cavern of Anger","","The layout is naturaly pushing you left, top or right, based on dead ends and where it opens up.
Follow the layout and dash across skippable points","https://youtube.com/shorts/QHlASMOsBmQ?si=LJhvo_f-i2_KYqEW"
"Cavern of Anger","Kill Merveil","Aim to be Level 11.5 - 12 when killing Merveil","Same as above",""

"Old Fields","[Optional] Place Portal at Den Entrance","This Side Quest is optional and only needed if missing 2. Quicksilver","",""
"Old Fields","Get to Crossroads","","Follow the road to crossroads. if the road temporarly ends, go top right.
If the road takes a right turn at the end, den is at the right side of the zone, next to the mountain
if the road goes straight or left turn the den entrance is on the left side of the road.",""
"Crossroads","Get to WP","If opting for the den, go to Town and take your portal, otherwise continue to CoS","Crossroad as the name implies has 4 Exits connected by a road. Left is always CoS, 
Top is Broken Bridge, Right is Fellshrine Ruins and Down from where you came is Old Fields",""
"Den","[Optional] Kill Beast for 2. Quicksilver","Skip this if you do not need a 2. Quicksilver Flask","",""

Entrance to Wetlands is above the WP",""
"Riverways","Get to Western Forest","","",""
"Western Forest","Get to WP","","On the side of the Road of the WP is ALWAYS Alira and 
opposite Side of the Road from the WP is ALWAYS weaver's chamber
to find Alira look for lit torches, for weaver's nest look for cobweb in the edge trees",""
"Western Forest","Get to Weaver's Chamber","","",""

"Crossroads","Get to Broken Bridge","","",""

already see it on the minimap and can shortcut",""
"Wetlands","Kill Oak","","If Oak is in the middle of the zone, wp is likely top left or straight up behind oak. 
If Oak is on the left side WP is likely top right corner",""

"Northern Forest","Get to Caverns","","Follow the right edge of the zone to find Cavern Entrance",""

"1. Town Visit","Get directly to Slums","if no need to sort inventory while walking, unequip Body 
hold it on mouse and move with 2. move only key","",""
"Slums","Get to Crematorium","You can place a portal next to Sewer Entrance,
die after completing trial and Tolmen's Bracelet in 
Crematorium and respawn in town to save time","follow the right edge of the zone till you find crematorium",""
"Crematorium","Trial","","If its a leftsided layout, follow left edge till you see the trial, then left of it should be piety
if it is a rightsided layout, follow right edge till you see the trial, then top left or top right corner of the zone should be Piety
if it contains vaal side are, piety could be bottom right corner",""
"Crematorium","Get Tolmen's Bracelet","","",""
"2. Town Visit","LvL 24 Skills (Auras/Curses)","Marmoa: Level 24 Skill Gem Reward","",""
"Slums","Unlock Sewers","","",""
"Sewers","Busts","","The Zone has a S like Pattern, its top left, top right to get to wp, then its top left afterwards to get to Marketplace.
The first Bust is always top Left befor the WP, second Bust directly after WP, based on 2, Bust Room. 
3rd bust is top left next to exit or bottom right.
If the 2. Bust is in a open big room, go up, otherwise go down.","https://youtube.com/shorts/MUIVpO9ScZU?si=wSCtzgAcFNPcr88h"
"Sewers","Get to Marketplace","","",""
"Marketplace","Get to WP","","Go up from the entrance till you find a edge, follow it into the direction of buildings, not water.
then follow till you find arhces, go through and follow path till wp and Catacombs entrance.
For Battlefront Entrance, follow the right edge of the zone, till you find it",""
"Catacombs","Trial","","Like Crypt, follow the right edge of the zone top right, till you find the trial",""
"3. Town Visit","Passive Point","Hargan: Passive Point","",""
"Marketplace","Get to Battlefront","","",""
"Battlefront","Get to WP","Docks if Level 24 otherwise do Solaris Temple first","Go Top Left till you see the WP, from the WP Spool is to the bottom left in a crate,
Top Left is Dock Entrance and Up/ Top Righ of the Zone is Solaris Temple",""
"Battlefront","Get Spool","","",""
"Battlefront","Get to Docks if Level 24, otherwise Get to ST","","",""
"Docks","Get Thaumatic Sulphite","Needs to be Level 24+ to get XP here, 
great Zone to farm to Level 26.5","Docks is made up of 'piers' at which end will always be a blue pack. 
one of the piers contains the wp and another one contains the thaumatic sulphite
traverse the zone clockwise or counterclockwise",""
"Solaris Temple 1","Get to Solaris Temple 2","","Follow the carpet, when a crossroad appears, walk in a direction and use dash skills to go back if its a deadend",""
"Solaris Temple 2","Talk to Diala","Diala: Fire & Rare Amulet
Flat Fire craft in the sideroom at the end","Check for Skips, follow the carpet",""
"Solaris Temple 2","Use WP to go to Sewers","","",""
"Sewers","unlock Blockage","","",""
"Ebony Baracks","Get to WP","","WP above the Entry, right of WP is always Imperial Gardens and top left is Gravicus and Lunaris Temple Entry",""
"Ebony Baracks","[Optional] Kill Gravicus","Gravicus Kill unlocks the Level 28 Skill Gems","",""
"Ebony Baracks","Get to Lunaris Temple","","",""
"Lunaris Temple 1","Get to Lunaris Temple 2","","Follow the Blue Carpet, if the carpet stops temporarily, follow the natural layout of the room",""
"Lunaris Temple 2","kill Piety","","Try to get away from the entrance, the correct way contains 3 stairs, the last leading to a T cross,
one side contains 1 wagong while the other contains 2 wagons. Go the direction containing 1 wagon.
You will get to a golden door,  try to follow the more 'open road', usualy either I shaped or L shaped from the first one.
after the second door go straight up the stairs to the boss room","https://youtube.com/shorts/bKpHJqA9Qz0?si=gROBKm5V7OcHaxJR"
"4. Town Visit","Passive Point","Passive Point: Grigor
Maramoa: Level 28 Skill Gem if Gravicus Killed Reward","",""
"Ebony Baracks","Get to Imperial Garden","","",""
"Imperial Garden","Get to WP","","The path leads up to the wp, the trial is always at the top left corner,
a series of wagons will lead from wp to the Sceptre of God
In some Layouts there is a direct connection from the trial to the Entrance to the SoG
The Library is left of the wp following the path","https://youtube.com/shorts/JvLLA8THvoI?si=3I0myr1Mrx9lUZnq"
"Imperial Garden","Trial","","",""
"Imperial Garden","[Optional] Get to Library","","",""

"Library","LvL 31 Supports","Siossa in Library: 31 Supports & ofclass Supports","",""

Do Lab now at Level 28","","",""
"Imperial Garden","Get to Sceptre of God","","",""
"Sceptre of God 1","Get to Sceptre of God 2","","The Stairs is always in a corner, most layouts will 'brick' one corner and one has the previous stairs, so there are 2 corners to check
After entering the Sceptre top left or right end will have the first stairs after follow the direction the stairs is facing,
if the natural layout of the zone leads you away from the first corner, go to the next.
if a corner has no stairs go next, the stairs is in the middle of a corner.",""
"Sceptre of God 2","Kill Dominus","Aim to be Level 29-30 when killing Dominus","Same Pattern as Sceptre of God 1",""

"Ascent","Get to Portal","","Very easy pattern, go up straight, then follow the road the first bridge is mostly in the middle
or rarely at the right wall of the zone.
Next go to the right wall the second 'bridge' is always at the right wall.
after go bit left to open the portal to A5","https://youtube.com/shorts/zuYOthlbThg?si=uKrwzOMvRvgWz4oz"

"Slave Pens","Get to Town","","Go left and down till you are forced to go up and find the warden",""
"1. Town Visit","Get to Control Blocks","Lani: Ring Reward","",""
"Control Blocks","Get Miasmeter","","Miasmeter is at the top left end of the zone and Exit to City Square at Top Right End.
To get to the Miasmeter, go top left to the first trench, dahs down and take stairs back, up and follow the layout till
you can go top left again. Then dash down for Miasmeter.
From Miasmeter go top right till second trench, dash down and up, go top right till you reach the edge. 
then top left, kill the overseer and proceed top right for Entrance to City Square.","https://youtube.com/shorts/U-oCLb9THnA?si=47jEqWyQOGeXfjc6"
"Control Blocks","Get Eyes of Zeal","","",""
"Control Blocks","Get to City Square","","",""
"Oriath Square","Get to Courthouse","","The Courthouse Entrance is always in top right corner. Go top right across the big square,
then after the bridge go bit further up, turn first right and then up till reaching the Courthouse",""
"Courthouse","Get to Chamber of Innocence","","Kinda inverted C shape, Go Down and right till you reach the big Courtroom
Then start going left and down till reaching bottom corner of the zone.
Go top left to find Chamber of Innocence entry","https://youtube.com/shorts/cdArQfrndd4?si=AYNqOeeRqXwrIuqQ"
"Chamber of Innocence","Kill Innocence","Great Zone to Level to 41","Big Circle, Always stay on the outer edge, each elevated layer contains a blue pack.
Towars the far top left start going down, the final area befor the boss room contains several blue packs",""
"Torched Courts","Get to Ruined Square","","Burned reverse of Courthouse","https://youtube.com/shorts/cdArQfrndd4?si=AYNqOeeRqXwrIuqQ"
"Ruined Square","Get to WP","","When leaving courthouse to get to the wp is a inverted S shape, go left, up, right, up to get to the wp
from wp you will go left to get to a bridge and across till you get to a big bloody fountain. from there top left is cathedral rooftop
and straight bottom of the zone you will get to reliquary","https://youtube.com/shorts/cdArQfrndd4?si=AYNqOeeRqXwrIuqQ"
"Ossuary","Get Staff","","Small Circle, first go right, till you can go up, go up till you can go left, go left till you can go down and go down till 
you can go right.",""
"Ruined Square","Place a Portal at the Middle of the Big Square","","",""
"Ruined Square","Get to Reliquary","","",""
"Reliquary","Collect Relics","","Big Circle, go clockwise or counterclockwise on the outer edge",""

"Ridge","Get to Lower Prison","","Take the right wall and follow it along till reaching the exit. the layouts can be confusing,
just keep focus on the inital right wall even if it takes a u turn",""
"Lower Prison","Trial","","try to go top right, if you can go further than just a small room its a 'up' layout.
the trial should be close to the start at the left side and top right is the exit
otherwise its a 'down' layout, the trial and exit will be somewhere far bottom down, 
either the trial is after the exit or the exit is a right turn befor the path leading to the trial",""
"Lower Prison","Get to Shavrones Tower","","",""
"Shavrones Tower","Get to Prisoner's Gate","","a connection of several small linear paths with a good amount of dead ends. 
the one big trap is a specific layout where the exit is in a early alkove 
and the expected path leads into a big dead end",""
"Prisoner's Gate","Kill Abberath","","from the wp stick to the same side of the road and follow the path, if you get to a ledge
continue till the opening to go through getting to a open area, otherwise cross the road to
the other side to get down the ledge and dothe above. once in the open area after the opening
do a counterclockwise circle to find abberath arena. after get back to road and follow to 
western forest entrance",""
"Prisoner's Gate","Get to Western Forest","","",""
"Western Forest","Get to Riverways","","follow the road",""
"Riverways","Get to WP","","follow the road to wp, wetlands is always top left of the wp, sometimes bit further away
the road will lead to a blockage turn to bottom right from the blockage to get to southern forest",""
"Riverways","Get to Wetlands","","",""
"Wetlannds","Kill Ryslatha","","The Ryslatha Arena entrance is usualy at the top left area, bit after the broken wp.
stick to the left wall to find it. Rarely its at top right, 
continue to follow the left wall till you find the arena",""

"Riverways","Get to Southern Forest","","",""
"Southern Forest","Get to Cavern of Anger","","Follow the right wall to get to a fallen tree stump as a bridge, continue to attemp to go right till
you either get to a big rock wall or find a tree stump going acroos the river, take the tree stump
and repeat. once at the big rock wall follow it to wp and beacon entrance",""
"Cavern of Anger","Pick up Black Flag","","After grabbing the Flag the zone will start the same with a J form, go up and then always take the
rightmost path untill the layout pushes you up, then go up to find the beacon entrance",""
"Cavern of Anger","Get to Beacon","","",""
"Beacon","Activate Beacon","","Generaly you will need to go up, most layouts will push you bottom right first 
before it allows you to go top right. follow the right wall from the entrance till the layout allows
you to go straight up and you find the beacon minigame",""
"Beacon","Get to Brine King Reaf","","",""

"Zone","To-Do","Notes","Layout Rules","Layout Video"
"1. Town Visit","Get to Broken Bridge","","",""
"Broken Bridge","[Optional] Get Silver Locket in Castle","If needing a specific Flask Type","",""
"Broken Bridge","Get to Crossroads","","follow the road to get to Crossroads, when seeing the broken wp, follow it to get to the castle containing
the silver locket",""
"Crossroads","Get to WP","","Follow the road leading to the WP, bottom right of the Zone is always Fellshrine Ruins 
and Top Left is Chamber of Sins",""
"Crossroads","Get to Fellshrine Ruins","","",""
"Fellshrine Ruins","Get to Crypt","","Follow the road, leading to the Crypt Entrance",""
"Crypt","Trial","","Trial is at the top corner of the first Zone, Entrance to the second zone is at the bottom corner
Maligaro's Map is at the bottom corner of the second Zone",""
"Crypt","Get Maligaro's Map","","",""
"2. Town Visit","[Optional] Flask ","Weylam: Flask Reward, if got Silver Locket","",""
"2. Town Visit","TP to Crossroads","","",""
"Crossroads","Get to Chamber of Sins","","",""
"Chamber of Sins 1","Get to Map Device & open Map","","The Entrance to Chamber of Sins 2 is always in the passage behind the WP
To get to the Centre take the left or right and follow till you get a non broken passage to center, sometimes you need
to go all the way around to the bottom of the zone",""
"Maligaro's Sanctum","Kill Maligaro","","The diffrent segments of the zone are connected via tiny passages, take a wall and follow it allong till you find one,
repeat till finding maligaro arena.",""
"Chamber of Sins 2","Trial","","Follow the wall that doesnt lead to a direct dead end room, if both ways seem to go, follow the right side",""
"Chamber of Sins 2","Get to Den","","",""
"Den","Get to Ashen Fields","","follow the wall that leads away from the wp",""
"Ashen Fields","Kill Greust / Ralakesh","","follow the road",""
"Early Lab 2","","Minimum Level 49, same as with Early Lab 1, if you get a big power boost from Lab 2 you can do it now","",""
"Northern Forest","Place Portal at Dread Thicket Entrance","","go to the left wall, then follow it upwards. if you do not find the dread thicket when you reached causeway entrance,
 its in the part bellow the wp of the zone.",""
"Northern Forest","Get to Causeway","","",""
"Causeway","Get Kishara's Star","","Zone is a I or a inverted C shape, go right till you are forced to go up or find the exit.
if forced up then go up till forced left and left till you find the exit",""
"Causeway","Get to Vaal City","","",""
"Vaal City","Get to WP","","WP is at center of a Square or U Shape surrounded by walls. Go Up till you get to a long blockage, 
that extends further upwards. the moment it has a opening go in bit into middle and then down till WP is visible",""
"3. Town Visit","[Optional] Get Greust Necklace","Helena offers Greust Necklace for a rare Amulet, only do this if Portal is close to the Azmeri Shrine too","",""
"3. Town Visit","Passive Point","Weylam: Passive Point Reward","",""
"3. Town Visit","Use Portal","","",""
"Northern Forest","Enter Dread Thicket","","",""
"Dread Thicket","Get Fireflays","Order of Fireflies & Gruthkul does not matter, usually you have 1-2 Fireflies left when you find Gruthkul Arena","Giant circle, go clockwise or counterclockwise till you have all fireflies and killed gruthkul",""
"Dread Thicket","Kill Gruthkul","","",""
"4. Town Visit","Passive Points, Boots","Helena: Boots, Amulet Reward if placed Necklace at Shrine
Eramir: 2x Passive Point","",""
"Vaal City","Enter Temple of Decay","","",""
"Temple of Decay 1","Get to Temple of Decay 2","","Follow the direction spawned in/stairs are facing till you can't, then turn in the direction layout is forcing you. Repeat",""
"Temple of Decay 2","Kill Arakaali","","Repeat Temple of Decay 1 Pattern, till entering the last zone, indicated by the purplish hue and purple glowing eggs. try to go up there to find Arakaali Arena",""
Act 8:
"Act 8 Pathing & Objectives Video:","","","",""
"Town NPCs","Function","","",""
"Clarissa","Wand & Jewelry, Quest Reward","","",""
"Hargan","Weapon & Armour Vendor, Quest Reward","","",""
"Maramoa","Quest Reward, All Gems(after Quest)","","",""
"Zone","To-Do","Notes","Layout Rules","Layout Video"
"1. Town Visit","Get to Toxic Conduit","","follow giant wall till entry, then trail wall back to town entrance",""
"Lab 2","","Recommended  Moment to do Lab 2","",""
"Toxic Conduit","Get to Coedress Cespool","","The zone is J shaped with the lower tip being the entrance, go into the direction 
that isnt on the side of the lid, then follow the path but keep trying to go up to the top right.
Once you can just go straight up unless a Curve forces you slightly to the left or right till
you find Doedre's Cespool",""
"Doedress Cespool","Kill Doedre","","Go across the bridge,take the left side, go right till you are forced to down.
It is either a I shaped Zone and the exit is at far right or a U shaped zone the exit being mostly
left but then bit up",""
"Doedress Cespool","Get to Quay","","The Exit to the quay is always right after killing doedre, the exit to grand promenade is always left
behind the recipe",""
"Quay","Get Ankh","","Stay at the left Wall of the Zone, when you see a tiny wooden bridge splitting of, 
cross it to get the ankh, go back and continue to follow the left wall to find the resurrection side.
To find the Grain Gate Exit, follow th right wall from the resurrection side and go bit back t
ill the path splits of from the one you came from. follow the new path till you find the exit",""
"Quay","Kill Tollmen","","",""
"Quay","Get to Grian Gate","","",""
"Grain Gate","Kill Gemling Legion","","Grain Gate is filled with warehouses, some have 2 entrances, others are dead ends.
The correct ones are marked with dead black guard corpses. continue walking open pathes and
only enter warehouses  that contain corpses at the entrance till you find a book icon. The 
Gemling Legion is there. Repeat the process to find the exit to Imperial Fields. 
The exit itself is marked by a passage with wagongs ",""
"Grain Gate","Find Underbelly Entrance","","",""
"Underbelly","Place Portal at the T Section","","Follow the road till it stops, then go straight top left to find Solaris Temple Entrance",""
"Underbelly","Enter Solaris Concourse","","",""
"Solaris Concourse","Enter Solaris Temple 1","","",""
"Solaris Temple 1","Get to WP","","Follow the carpet till the wp, then top leftof the wp is solaris temple 2 entry 
Straight line from the wp once gone through the door leading up.
and bottom left of the wp is the exit to solaris concourse",""
"Town Visit","Use Portal","","",""
"Underbelly","Get to Bath House","","",""
"Bath House","Place Portal and get to Lunaris Concourse","","",""
"Lunaris concourse","Get WP then return to Bath House (Portal)","","",""
"Bath House","Trial","","The zone contains 4 'things', the middle room with the wings of vastiri, a hideout, trial and
the entry to high gardens. To identify whats where, go top left from lunaris concouse entrance and look whats above it.
its either the trial or the hideout, if its the hideout the trial is at the other end after the high garden entrance. 
The Entrance to high garden is in the middle above the wings of vastiri",""
"Bath House","Get to High Gardens","","",""
"High Gardens","Kill Yugul","","",""
"Town Visit","Passive Point","Hargan: Passive Point","",""
"Solaris Temple 1","Get to Solaris Temple 2","","If there is no skip in your layout, follow the carpet, if the carpet is stopping, or splitting follow the
way the layout is pushing towards. usualy the layout is u shaped",""
"Solaris Temple 2","Get Sun Orb","","",""
"Lunaris Concourse","Get to Lunaris Temple","","Lunaris Concourse mimicks general layout of Ebony Barracks
Go top left from entrance to find wp.
Top Left of the WP is Lunaris Temple and bottom Left Bath House",""
"Lunaris Temple 1","Get to Lunaris Temple 2","","Follow the Blue Carpet, if the carpet stops temporarily, follow the natural layout of the room",""
"Lunaris Temple 2","Get Moon Orb","","Try to get away from the entrance, the correct way contains 3 stairs, the last leading to a T cross,
one side contains 1 flower pot while the other contains 2 flower pots. Go the direction containing 1 flower pot.
You will get to a golden door,  try to follow the more 'open road', usualy either I shaped or L shaped from the first one.
after the second door go straight up the stairs to the boss room",""
"3. Town Visit","TP to Lunaris Concourse","","",""
"Solaris/Lunaris Concourse","Get to Harbour Bridge","Based on Res/Pref, generally Recommended Solaris Side","",""
"Harbour Bridge","Kill Lunaris and Solaris","","",""

"Blood Auquaduct","Get to Town","Feel free to Level here till Level 60/61","2 Paralel Lanes, one line can be interupted, then use a crossing at the interuption or shortly befor
to get to the other lane",""
"1. Town Visit","Get to Descent","","",""
"Late 2. Lab","","Latest Point to do 2. Lab to still get some XP out of it","",""
"Descent","Get to Vastiri Desert","","Descent contains 3 Segments, generaly you want to go down and right, 
if a segment starts right it might be down and left for this one.",""
"Vastiri Desert","Get Sand Sword","","Go Right till you see the wp, if you haven't foundthe storm weatherd chest yet, turn down,
till reaching a wall or finding the chest, if reaching a wall go right next, grab the wp and further right,
if still no chest, go up place portal at oasis entrance and go top left of wp, last spot weathered chest
can be in, then up from wp is entrance to foothills",""
"Vastiri Desert","Place Portal at Oasis Entrance","","",""
"Vastiri Desert","Get to Foothills","","",""
"Foothills","Get to WP","","Straight Up from entrance is WP and Boiling Lake Entrance
Top Left from WP is Tunnel",""
"2. Town Visit","Get Sand Bottle","Talk to Petarus & Vanja,
twice to Sin,
then to Petarus & Vanja","",""
"2. Town Visit","Weapon","Petarus & Vanja: Weapon  or Offhand Reward","",""
"2. Town Visit","Take Portal to Vastiri Desert","","",""
"Vastiri Desert","Enter Oasis","","",""
"Oasis","Kill Shakari","","Go along the right wall, the first gate should always be sand pit",""
"3. Town Visit","TP to Foothills","You can collect Passive Point now, recommended is later","",""
"Foothills","Enter Boiling Lake","","",""
"Boiling Lake","Kill Basilisk","","",""
"4. Town Visit","TP to Foothills","","",""
"Foothills","Get to Tunnel","","",""
"Tunnel","Trial","","WP is Top Left from Entrance, befor WP is a split either to top right or bottom left
containing the trial. From WP is just one path leading to Quarry",""
"Tunnel","Get to Quarry","","",""
"Quarry","Get to WP","","Quarry has 2 base variations, either Refinery is right of wp and Garukhan is left or both are right.
Grab the WP first , its top left of the Entrance, then go top right from WP to find either Refinery or
Stairs leading to Garukhan Arena, go along the wall further up to find Refinery Entrance.
If Garukhan stairs arent on the right side they are bottom left from WP",""
"Quarry","Get to Refinery","","",""
"Refinery","Get Trathan Powder","","Go Top Left from Entrance, till you can go into a building, go in and look for closest exit to
an open area again, go top right till next building and continue top right inside, to get out again and
till you find entrance to are General Adus arena",""
"Quarry","Unlock Belly of the Beast","Talk to Sin to start unlock animation while progressing","",""
"Quarry","Kill Garukhan","","",""
"5. Town Visit","Passive Points","Irasha: 2x Passive Point","",""
"5. Town Visit","TP to Quarry","","",""
"Quarry","Enter Belly of the Beast","","",""
"Belly of the Beast","Get to Rotting Core","","Follow the path till first T connection, take the left turn continue till you can go top left.
continue top left till you can turn right and follow the main path from there
If the layout is forcing you long right, the above is inversed. The exit is always about top left
from the entrance in a straight line",""
"Rotting Core","Kill Deprived Trinity","Recommended to be Level 61 - 62 when killing Deprived Trinity","Try to get top left, go left or up as needed, till reaching rotten core,
The three dreams are linear",""
Act 10:
"Act 10 Pathing & Objectives Video:","","","",""
"Town NPCs","Function","","",""
"Lani","Wand & Jewelry Vendor, Quest Reward","","",""
"Weylam","Weapon & Armour Vendor, Quest Reward","","",""

"Zone","To-Do","Notes","Layout Rules","Layout Video"
"1. Town Visit","Get to Cathedral Rooftop","","",""
"Cathedral Rooftop","Help Bannon","","Bannon will always be in the former Boss Arena at the left top End of the Zone
Walkdown towards bottom right, the exit to Ravaged Square is at the right edge.
the 'segments' are divided by walls, if there is no connection in the middle of the wall,
there will be one at either of the edges.",""
"Cathedral Rooftop","Get to Ravaged Square","","",""
"Ravaged Square","Place Portal in the middle of Big Plaza","","In the middle of the initial plaza is a fountain, littered with corpses.
Right from there will be 2 bridges, the top right one will be damaged, can be skipped with Blink Arrow
or Lighting Warp.
The straight right one is undamaged, take that one. then turn left 
to follow the path to the wp. 
Next to the WP is always Ossuary and Blocked Path to Canals.
Going Bottom Right from WP is Torched Courts, to go there is  a C pattern at the
next Crossroad, go left,down, right to reach the Entry.
Go Down from the Fountain, till seeing Reliquary Entrance and/or Passage to the Left
Take Passage and go Top Left till a tiny opening leads you to Control Blocks",""
"Ravaged Square","Get to WP","","",""
"2. Town Visit","Take Portal to Ravaged Square","","",""
"Ravaged Square","Get to Control Blocks","","",""
"Control Blocks","Get to WP","","",""
"Ravaged Square","Get to Torched Courts","","",""
"Torched Courts","Get to Desecrated Chambers","","Kinda inverted C or G shape, Go Down and right till you reach the big Courtroom
Then start going left and down till reaching bottom corner of the zone.
Go top left to find Desecrated Chambers entry",""
"Desecrated chambers","Get Staff of Avarius","","Big Circle, Always stay on the outer edge, each elevated layer contains a blue pack.
Towars the far top left start going down, the final area befor the boss room contains several blue packs",""
"Desecrated chambers","Get to WP","","",""
"Control Blocks","Kill Vilenta","","Go Bottom Left and Down till you reach the first trench, dash down 
and go top left to reach upper end of it.
Dash back up the left side at a broken gate and go left till reaching Vilenta Arena",""
"2. Town Visit","Passive Point, Chest","Lani: Passive Point, Rare Chest Reward","",""
"2. Town Visit","Revive Innocence","Talk to Bannon","",""
"Ravaged Square","Enter Ossuary","","",""
"Ossuary","Trial","","Ossuaray is a 8 Pattern, to get to Trial, Crafting Recipe & Elixir of Allure,
go Top Right till wall, Bottom Right till you can go Top Right again, 
Top right till you see the book indicator for trial.
At the Crossroad when going Top Right again, you can also go Bottom Left 
to get to the Forbidden Archive for the first Sanctum",""
"3. Town Visit","TP to Ravaged Square","","",""
"3. Lab","","62 recommended lowest Level","",""
"Ravaged Square","Unlock Canals","Talk to Innocence","",""
"Canals","Get to Feeding Through","","Snake like winding Pattern, follow the path
Go Top Left whenever you can, if you can't follow the path bottom left or top right 
till you can go Top Left again",""
"Feeding Through","Kill Kitava","Recommended to be Level 62 - 63","2 Paralel Lanes, go Top Left either Side, Recipe on the Left one",""
"4. Town Visit","Passive Points","Lani: Passive Point","",""
